website_summaries.verdict: Customers willingly pay a bit more for this All-Clad roaster, which yields consistent results and reliable performance over time.
pros: An efficient V-rack browns meat evenly, while tall sides minimize splatters and spills
cons: Very heavy, particularly when loaded up with a larger turkey or chicken

customer_reviews.title: heavy, substantial pan
customer_reviews.text: Worked out great - heavy, substantial pan - not a thin walled imitation. only slightly smaller (1") than my previous pan but handled a 19 lb turkey with no problem - fit better into my oven than the last pan. handle arrangement is very good for moving the pan, then removing the contents. Hihly recommended by this cook. I got this on sale for $80 so it was a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: P. Daigler

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't "feel or act" like All-Clad
customer_reviews.text: It is an All-Clad product, but it doesn't "feel or act" like All-Clad. I use All-Clad pots currently for cooking and have used an All-Clad non stick griddle in the past which we loved! I destroyed that griddle until the non stick layer started peeling off, it took about 8 years to make that happen (metal utensils, high heat...). This roasting pan has already scratched with one cleaning when I left a metal utensil in it to wash dishes. My best guess is this won't last a year with how we use our cookware. I would still buy All-Clad products, except this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a cheaper pan just like this from Bed Bath and Beyond. After one year, and wasn't used very often, the non stick coating began to peel off so had to toss. As they always say, you get what you pay for. Have always loved All-Clad cookware, and loving this pan!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Finish chipped off the wire rack the first time it ...
customer_reviews.text: Finish chipped off the wire rack the first time it was used. Replaced by All-Clad. Have not used the replacement yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality, you will NOT regret buying this!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a wedding gift from my registry, and love how amazing the quality is. I have used it multiple times for turkeys, roasts, hams, you name it. It's pretty much a holiday staple and I am certain I will be using it for many, many years. My mom loved it so much when I used it last Thanksgiving she requested one as a Christmas gift!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Morales

customer_reviews.title: Lives up to the All-Clad name
customer_reviews.text: This roasting pan has been used several times so far, mainly for roasting vegetables, and it has worked great. The nonstick coating is very durable, and the handles are convenient for takingg it out of the oven without having to grab a hot pan. I have some other All-Clad cookware and am very pleased with all of them.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Lawler

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Solid cooking piece that my wife wanted to Christmas. All-Clad makes quality items. Just be aware that the handles stick up, as you can see in the image, which requires more storage space but helps when you're handling a hot roasting pan.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty roasting pan/easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: All-Clad lives up to its standards with this roasting pan. It is well made and performs beautifully. My roast was done to perfection and clean up was a snap. The price was also favorable considering its competition. Great product, great value.
customer_reviews.author: Harborlou

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to register for warranty
customer_reviews.text: Trying to register the warranty for this is an exercise in total frustration. Tried via phone, website and text, and have still been unable to register. Guess they don't want to stand behind their product.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Davis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy construction and finish. Deeper than most roasters which is a plus
customer_reviews.author: Peter Garvey

customer_reviews.title: Quality Roasting Tray
customer_reviews.text: Cooked an 18 pound turkey on this for Thanksgiving. Easy to clean with a simple sponge. Well worth the price for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Steven J. Morales Jr.

customer_reviews.title: This roasting is a kitchen winner
customer_reviews.text: I waited a long time to purchase a roasting pan. This all-clad one did not disappoint. Roasted chickens are moist on the inside and crispy on the outside. It’s easy to clean and easy to move from he oven to the counter.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Great pan
customer_reviews.text: A turkey for Thanksgiving and a Prim Rib for Christmas, this pan does it all and cleans up great.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Israel

customer_reviews.title: I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality. I look forward to using it for many years. I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: R Vancleve

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Just another great All Clad product. The pan will last for years. The rack is just ok.
customer_reviews.author: Mark McClure

customer_reviews.title: The best roaster ever...size, cooking & clean up
customer_reviews.text: This pan was large enough for our 20+lb turkey-and super easy to clean after soaking for a bit (including the rack). It’s heavy & even heavier with a turkey or roast but my hubby helped with the lifting in & out if the oven. The heaviness is well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: sharon

customer_reviews.title: GREAT QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: Really happy 😚 With this heavy and high quality roasting pan and rack.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Anne

customer_reviews.title: Great pan for roasting a turkey
customer_reviews.text: Love this pan! Fit my 12 pound turkey beautifully! East to use in the oven and on the stove top. A breeze to clean due to its non stick features.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have in any chefs kitchen
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy and well-made even heat displacement roasting pan. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Caron

customer_reviews.title: Have used it many times and couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.text: This is a heavy well built pan. Have used it many times and couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Larry hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Totally non stick
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Totally non stick. Even cooking, easy clean up. Rack makes getting the turkey out very easy. I made a 22lb bird and it handled it very well.
customer_reviews.author: nursedollie

customer_reviews.title: handles the big, heavy items to cook!
customer_reviews.text: A very sturdy, well-made roaster. I've cooked a 23 lbs turkey & a ham on the rack. I have another roaster that is sturdy, but this one, the rack fits well in the pan. No slipping around, knocking the human carrier off balance and the meat goes cattywampus onto the floor. I like the handles also. Easy to grab to tote the heavy item. I'll also be using it for lasagne. It's an upscale roaster without a price that shocks the pocket book.
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: Nice pan
customer_reviews.text: Update: Cooked a 19 lb Thanksgiving turkey today! Would not be able to fit a Turkey more than 20 lbs., so keep that in mind. Overall, loved the pan and esp the handles. Everything cleaned up nicely too. Would recommend. Haven't cooked in it yet, but this is sturdy, the handles are helpful, and I am excited to cook my Thanksgiving turkey of 17-20 lbs in it. Will update on cleaning in another review.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Marie

customer_reviews.title: I have a hard anodized pan that I love and since she asked for a roasting pan for ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pan for my daughter-in-law's birthday. I have a hard anodized pan that I love and since she asked for a roasting pan for her birthday, this one was perfect. I understand that they used it as soon as they got it and were very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Hooper

customer_reviews.title: Best turkey ever
customer_reviews.text: Best turkey I've cooked in years. Love the inside rack where you set the turkey on and very good heat distribution so you don't have some parts raw and some parts overclocked. Very easy cleanup also
customer_reviews.author: dakota

customer_reviews.title: So How do You Make the Gravy?
customer_reviews.text: A pretty pan and heavy. I am sure it would have done well in the oven. But a friend thought she had heard something about anodized on the stove top. So I called All Clad. Sure enough, they recommend against using on direct heat-IE: a burner. This is not mentioned in the pamphlet which comes with the pan. Tsk. Had to send it back, sorry. I was ready to like it.
customer_reviews.author: solanco

customer_reviews.title: Not induction compatible
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this based on the web description that indicated that it is induction compatible. However the product box clearly states that it is not induction compatible, and it isn't induction compatible. Looks like a great roasting pan if you don't need to use it on an induction cooktop.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a really great quality. Easy to lift and easy to clean. Fits a good size piece of meat. Love the rack and the size of the handles. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Wow!  Great pan!
customer_reviews.text: It's pure quality. I didn't have a pan large enough for my roast and ordered this one. It arrived in just 2-3 days. Can't beat the quality or the size! Impressive in every way.
customer_reviews.author: adragonfly

customer_reviews.title: The last roasting pan you'll likely ever need to buy.
customer_reviews.text: If you like to cook a nice roast then this is the pan for you. I'm the kind of person that is skeptical about most products today since almost everything is cheap and breaks after a few uses. This pan however is built tough and will most likely outlive you! it is extremely well built. The pan can also be used on direct heat so is perfect for making gravy from the roasting juices.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The perfect roasting pan ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully made; roasts evenly; cleans well. Big enough for roasting a large turkey too.
customer_reviews.author: SeattleShirley

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding quality and value
customer_reviews.text: Will definitely purchase more from All-clad. I have cooked two turkeys in this so far and both have come out amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Mick Kruger

customer_reviews.title: Nice Roaster
customer_reviews.text: 24 lb turkey was no problem. Very sturdy and easy to clean, except for the rack. Every roaster's rack I've tried is a PIA to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Woods13

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product -- Must Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Can't to wrong with All-Clad! I've used to sear meat on the stove before putting in oven and it's amazing! Even heat distribution and doesn't scratch easily.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel NY

product_meta.title: All-Clad E7649764 HA1 Hard Anodized Nonstick Dishwasher Safe PFOA Free Roaster Cookware, 13-Inch by 16-Inch, Black
product_meta.description: Roast meat, poultry, and vegetables to perfection with this versatile All-Clad HA1 Hard Anodized E7649764 Nonstick 13" x 16" roaster. The heavy-duty roasting pan features tall, straight sides, which help prevent splatters and spills, while its upright handles ensure a secure hold when transporting the pan to and from the oven. The roaster's V-shaped nonstick roasting rack elevates large cuts of meat to promote even heating, plus makes it easy to collect natural juices from the base of the pan for basting, glazing, or making gravy. With HA1 Hard Anodized cookware, you can experience the renowned quality of All-Clad and the ultimate convenience of nonstick. The All-Clad cookware's three layers of PFOA-free nonstick coating ensure effortless food release and make cleanup a breeze. Even more, Hard Anodized nonstick cookware offers dishwasher-safe convenience, induction compatibility, and warp-resistant strength. Discover what it means to cook with All-Clad.
feature_bullets: LARGE CAPACITY: Large 13-by-16-inch nonstick roasting pan with removable V-shaped nonstick roasting rack holds up to 25-lbs
CONVENIENT: Hard Anodized aluminum construction for fast, even heating and easy cleanup; Anti-Warp base
PREMIUM QUALITY: PFOA-free scratch resistant nonstick coating for healthier cooking with less fat
EASY TO USE: Stainless-steel handles contoured for a comfortable hold and permanently secured with stainless-steel rivets
LIFETIME LONGEVITY: Oven safe to 500 degrees F (without lids); dishwasher-safe, hand-wash recommended; limited lifetime warranty
ACCESSORIES INCLUDED: The roaster comes with a V-shaped nonstick roasting rack that elevates large cuts of meat to promote pure flavor

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars141 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
